code: import React,{useContext}from"react";import authContext from"../context/auth/authContext";import ErrorList from"./ErrorList";import{Toast}from"react-bootstrap";import"animate.css";const Alerts=()=>{const{errors}=useContext(authContext);if(!errors||errors.length===0)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"alerts"},errors.map((err,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{key:index,className:"alert alert-danger"},typeof err==="string"?err:JSON.stringify(err))));};export default Alerts;
